author: Nerdstalgic
description:
Tron: Uprising was sleek, smart, and visually groundbreaking.  It was a continuation of the Tron universe that gave fans everywhere exactly what they wanted. 

Unlike Disney's Tron: Legacy, this animated series actually put Tron himself back at the center of the story, while also pushing the limits of animation and storytelling.  And yet… somehow, almost no one remembers it.

#tron #tronares #tronlegacy #tronuprising
title: The Very Strange Tron Show Time Forgot
